    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerViewOnServer

        public PlayerViewOnServer(ViewFacadeInterfaceRMIClient view,
                          int timeout)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Create a new wrapper for a player on the server. The wrapper allows to call syncronous operation on the client with a timeout
        Parameters:
        view - View of the player (already initialized)
        timeout - Disconnection Timeout in seconds
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - If an error occurs while utilizing RMI
